TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ItemEvents_10_BeforeAttachmentSaveEventHandler(Attachment Attachment, out bool Cancel);
.class public auto ansi sealed ItemEvents_10_BeforeAttachmentSaveEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ItemEvents_10_BeforeAttachmentSaveEventHandler(Attachment As Attachment, ByRef Cancel As Boolean)
public delegate void ItemEvents_10_BeforeAttachmentSaveEventHandler(Attachment ^ Attachment, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] bool % Cancel);

Docs.param: False when the event occurs. If the event procedure sets this argument to True, the save operation is not completed and the attachment is not changed.
Docs.summary: This is a delegate for an event in the corresponding object. After implementing a callback method for the event, use this delegate to connect the callback method to the event. If there are multiple versions of the event interface, this delegate connects the callback method for the event in the specified version of Outlook.
